last_assistant_message:
## Task Complete

**Task**: #17 - Write Tests & Implement Performance & Talent (MS-08)
**Status**: Completed

**What was done**:
- Created 6 domain modules: Goal, Evaluation, Scorecard, Talent, Succession, IDP
- Each with service, controller, and module files following NestJS patterns
- Prisma client generated from existing schema
- app.module.ts + main.ts (port 3008)
- 9-Box Grid calculation (Performance x Potential mapping)
- 6 CG Competencies seeded: Customer Focus, Innovation & Agility, Collaboration, Integrity & Trust, Result Orientation, People Development
- Evaluation workflow: draft → self_review → manager_review → calibration → completed
- IDP sign-off workflow (employee + manager)
- RBAC on all endpoints

**Verification**: 9 test suites, **113 tests ALL PASSING**

## Task Complete

**Task**: Write Tests & Implement Performance & Talent (MS-08)
**Status**: Completed

**What was done**:
- Created full NestJS microservice at `src/services/performance-talent/`
- Prisma schema with 8 models (Goal, Evaluation, EvaluationScore, Competency, TalentProfile, SuccessionPlan, Successor, IDPPlan)
- 6 service modules: GoalService, EvaluationService, ScorecardService, TalentService, SuccessionService, IdpService
- 6 controllers with full REST API endpoints
- 9-Box Grid with `calculateNineBoxPosition()` and all 9 positions mapped
- CG Competency model (6 core competencies with Thai names)
- IDP workflow with employee/manager dual signing
- Succession planning with nominee readiness tracking
- Scorecard with composite score calculation

**Files changed**:
- `src/services/performance-talent/` — entire service directory (30+ files)
- Key files: `prisma/schema.prisma`, `src/goal/goal.service.ts`, `src/evaluation/evaluation.service.ts`, `src/scorecard/scorecard.service.ts`, `src/talent/talent.service.ts`, `src/succession/succession.service.ts`, `src/idp/idp.service.ts`

**Verification**: 9 test suites, 112 tests — all passing
